translation.text: Detour in effect on route 79 SKYLINE NORTHBOUND

Detour in effect on route 79 SKYLINE

Route 79 NORTHBOUND will detour 

Detour Route 79 from 
Madison to N Dickerson
No service on Skyline Ridge due to construction
From Skyline Hospital, continue Doverside 
back to Dickerson
R-Dickerson to regular route.
Detour in effect on route 79 SKYLINE EASTBOUND

Detour in effect on route 79 SKYLINE

Route 79 EASTBOUND will detour 

Detour Route 79 towards Madison
No service on Skyline Ridge due to construction
On Dickerson at Skyline Ridge Dr,
Continue Dickerson
L-Doverside to Skyline Hospital
Continue regular route to Walmart
Detour in effect on route 22 BORDEAUX FROM DOWNTOWN

Stops between TIMOTHY DR & FAIRVIEW DR SB and CLARKSVILLE PIKE & ABERNATHY RD SB will not be served while this detour is in effect.
